job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.industry: Computer Hardware,Computer Software,Information Technology and Services
job.description: microsofts wcb health team is looking for a senior software engineer who loves to learn solve challenges and be a part of a team working to collaborate with healthcare partners to help people navigate complicated systems such as healthcare you may have worked on similar projects or youre looking for a new adventureltbrgtltbrgtto be successful in this role you value open communication and breaking down technical complexity you are energized by sharing the knowledge you hold to improve the team you are on you are capable of visualizing and driving toward longterm success while addressing and solving for immediate uncertainties you are comfortable dealing with the ambiguities that come from being the driving force for change in an industry you embrace diversity of experience and thoughtltbrgtltbrgtyoure a tireless advocate for the customer and great engineering practicesenthusiastic about building and iterating on designs to discover what works best and applying your knowledge to create incredibly reliable scalable and delightful consumer experiences youre passionate about your interests and you want to work on projects that will challenge your technical and collaborative capabilitiesltbrgtltbrgtyou understand how to be on a collaborative team as a leader with the ability to solve difficult engineering problems point out whats not quite right mentor others towards better answers and smooth the customers journey through physical and digital footprints you find ways to reduce the number of steps to secure and scalable systems by using every tool in the toolboxltbrgtltbrgtyoull work in a focused team collaborating with large internal and external partners in healthcare bouncing ideas around formulating plans and charting the path forward for the future of healthcareltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtresponsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtunderstand customers overall technical requirements priorities and success measures to design system architecture and implementation paths ltligtltligtmaintain and advance deep technical skills and knowledge keeping up to date with market trends and competitive insights ltligtltligtwork with program managers to understand customer needs and provide insights and best practices ltligtltligtdesign code debug and problemsolve with internal and external members of the team on a wide array of proposed web desktop and mobile experiences ltligtltligtcreate a track record of driving decisions collaboratively resolving conflicts and blockers with creative problemsolving and ensuring follow related field or years of relative experienceltligtltligt years of coding skills in at least one general purpose programming language java c javascript etc ltligtltligtfamiliar with at least one major cloud provider azure aws gcp or other ltligtltligtbreadth of technical experience and knowledge as well as depth in at least one of the following areas database architecture etl data mining business intelligence big data advance analytics data structure data mining data governance fhir hl desktop or web frontend ux
